sentences.english: Have you ever been treated for gingivitis or periodontitis?
sentences.chinese: 您针对牙龈炎或牙周炎治疗过吗？

sentences.english: Clinical observation on curative effect of compound areca gargle on dental plaque and gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 复方槟榔含漱液对控制菌斑和消除牙龈炎疗效观察。

sentences.english: In medical term, this is called pregnancy gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 在医学上，这叫做妊娠性牙龈炎。

sentences.english: It also helps relieve toothaches and gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 它还有助于缓解牙痛和齿龈炎。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of microwave on treatment of hyperplastic gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察微波治疗纤维增生性龈炎效果。

sentences.english: It is this stage that gingivitis is most notable.
sentences.chinese: 这是这个阶段牙龈炎是最显着的。

sentences.english: The incidence of gingivitis led by crowns with poor margin fitness is 100%.
sentences.chinese: 密合性差的修复体龈炎发生率为100%。

sentences.english: Elderly patients with diabetes are often accompanied by varying degrees of gingivitis and periodontitis .
sentences.chinese: 老年糖尿病患者往往伴有不同程度的牙龈炎和牙周炎。

sentences.english: Obijective To observe the effects of Compound tea polyphenols oral rinse in treatment of gingivitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察复方茶多酚含漱液对少儿牙龈炎的治疗效果。

sentences.english: To grasp histopathological feature of marginal gingivitis and gingiva hyperplasia.
sentences.chinese: 了解边缘性龈炎及龈增生的组织病理特点。

sentences.english: The recurrent rate of the marginal gingivitis can be decreased in a magnetic field that interferes with adhesive force of the dental tophus.
sentences.chinese: 用磁场影响牙结石重新附着可降低缘龈炎的复发率。

sentences.english: Scaling is one of the major methods for treating gingivitis and periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 洁治是治疗牙龈炎和牙周炎的主要手段之一。

sentences.english: Those who don’t floss regularly have much higher chances of developing an oral disease, such as gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 不经常使用牙线的人会更容易患上牙龈炎等口腔疾病。

sentences.english: Be aware of the causes and symptoms of gingivitis.
sentences.chinese: 要注意的原因和牙龈炎的症状。

definition: stomatitis/ulceration of oral cavity/inflammation of the mucous lining of the mouth
